basic.description: This course is an analysis of the complexity of algorithms, including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms; use and implementation of graphs.
basic.subject: COP
basic.title: Complexity and Analysis of Data Structures and Algorithms

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: COP 4530 and MAD 3105. Corequisite: STA 3032 or STA 4321; and STA 4442.
